title: Enforcement; duties of sheriffs and police officers
context: §105-4 Enforcement; duties of sheriffs and police officers. The sheriff and the sheriff&rsquo;s deputies, or any police officer, within their respective jurisdictions, shall investigate any violation, or suspected violation of, and shall enforce section 105-1. [L 1949, c 389, pt of §1(d); RL 1955, §7-13; am L 1963, c 85, §3; HRS §105-4; gen ch 1985]
